t: Alamance Foods Inc. approved for $42 million expansion in Burlington, creating 135 new jobs | Burlington, NC - Official Website
s: Alamance Foods, Inc., a manufacturer of a variety of consumer food products, will invest $42 million to expand its North Carolina operations in Alamance County, Governor Roy Cooper announced today (December 6). The company will create 135 jobs in Burlington.
